item.description: Physical Rescue; INC#1151; 04:33PM; 1500 S Gaffey St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Vdx3A5; #SanPedro; Firefighters responded to an (apparent) solo-vehicle crash with two elderly patients trapped. Firefighters quickly extricated both patients (one male, one female) and transported them to the hospital in moderate condition. LAPD Inc #2525. Nothing further.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E248 RA101 RA112 T48; CH4; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1174; 04:49PM; 18900 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PEq02c; #Reseda; Firefighters responded to an (apparent) solo-vehicle crash with one patient trapped. Sadly, the trapped patient was deceased at the scene. One other patient exited the vehicle on their own with minor injuries and was transported to the hospital in fair condition. Unknown age/gender. LAPD Inc #2581. Nothing further.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E273 E293 EM15 HR3 RA104 RA73 T73 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1193; 05:29PM; 2453 N Jupiter Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V6ifTZ; #HollywoodHillsWest; Thirty firefighters mounted a swift attack, coordinating interior fire attack with rooftop ventilation, and extinguished the flames in 25 minutes. Thankfully, all occupants escaped the burning home unharmed. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC18 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E293 E41 E61 E97 EM14 RA27 RA97 T27 T60 T93; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1193; 05:04PM; 2453 N Jupiter Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V6ifTZ; #HollywoodHillsWest; Two-story descending hillside home with fire on the second floor. Offensive mode.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E227 E260 E27 E41 E97 RA27 RA97 T27 T60; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0335; 06:04AM; 7650 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Wobv4W; #VanNuys; 42 LAFD Firefighters took just 42 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire that destroyed two modular homes, in Space 57 (origin) and Space 56 to the east. Firefighters greatly limited damage to an exposed modular home to the west in Space 58, as well as nearby industrial buildings. No injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E103 E273 E287 E290 E73 E81 E90 EM15 RA100 RA87 RA90 T73 T87 T90; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0335; 05:22AM; 7650 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Wobv4W; #VanNuys; PRELIM: One modular (mobile) home in Space 57 was fully involved on LAFD arrival, with flames extending to the east, involving and heavily damaging the modular home in Space 56. Firefighters have been successful in greatly limiting damage to the exposed modular home to the west in Space 58, as well as nearby industrial buildings. As the offensive firefight continues against stubborn flames, all occupants of the modular homes are believed accounted for, and no injuries have been reported.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E103 E273 E287 E290 E73 E81 E90 EM15 RA100 RA87 RA90 T73 T87 T90; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1952; 11:50PM; 3855 N Eureka Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Yv4bX7; #StudioCity; 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 25 minutes (12:15 AM) to access, aggressively confine and fully extinguish flames involving a vehicle and contents in a garage attached to a one-story home. One firefighter sustained a non-life threatening burn injury to their shoulder during the firefight, and has been taken to a regional hospital in fair condition. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E288 E76 E97 E98 RA76 RA97 T60 T78 T88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 12/16/2022 INC#0669

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0669; 11:04AM; 310 S Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ys20U9; #Koreatown; 85 LAFD Firefighters took just 20 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within a one-story discount merchandise store that was open for business at the time of the fire. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E203 E211 E226 E229 E261 E35 E52 E6 E88 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA20 RA6 RA806 T11 T26 T29 T3 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#0591; 10:30AM; 6222 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3WrcO3g; #NorthHollywood; Address Corrected from 6215 to 6222.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E239 E260 E278 E298 E76 E77 E89 EM14 RA60 RA889 RA89 T39 T60 T78 T98; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey
